senses: [{"definition":"The expulsion from the womb of a foetus or embryo before it is fully developed, with loss of the foetus; either naturally as a spontaneous abortion (now usually called a miscarriage), or deliberately as an induced abortion.","example":null},{"definition":"An aborted foetus; an abortus.","example":null},{"definition":"A misshapen person or thing; a monstrosity.","example":null},{"definition":"Failure or abandonment of a project, promise, goal etc.","example":null},{"definition":"Arrest of development of any organ, so that it remains an imperfect formation or is absorbed.","example":null},{"definition":"The cessation of an illness or disease at a very early stage.","example":null}]
